text: ai ahale kitaab jab paigambaron kee aamad mein bahut rookaavat huee to hamaara rasool tumhaare paas aaya jo ehakaame khuda ko saaf saaf bayaan karata hai taaki tum kaheen ye na kah baitho ki hamaare paas to na koee khushakhabaree dene vaala (paigambar) aaya na (azaab se) daraane vaala ab to (ye nahin kah sakate kyonki) yaqeenan tumhaare paas khushakhabaree dene vaala aur daraane vaala paigambar aa gaya aur khuda har cheez par qaadir hai
